name: immigrate

to come to live in a different country: He immigrated with his parents in 1895 and grew up on Long Island. Opposite
emigrateCompare
migrate (TRAVEL/MOVE)

to come to live permanently in a country that is not your own: immigrate into/to sth His family immigrated to Canada shortly after the war started, and has lived here ever since. Compare
emigrate
